<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Marks all of the API user's alerts as read or viewed"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/alerts/mark-all"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Marks all of the API user's alerts as read or viewed. Must specify "read" or "viewed" parameters.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"read":{"type":"boolean","description":"If specified, marks all alerts as read."},"viewed":{"type":"boolean","description":"If specified, marks all alerts as viewed. This will remove the alert counter but keep unactioned alerts highlighted."}}}},"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"read":{"type":"boolean","description":"If specified, marks all alerts as read."},"viewed":{"type":"boolean","description":"If specified, marks all alerts as viewed. This will remove the alert counter but keep unactioned alerts highlighted."}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"success":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
